collection.name: Sub Collections
collection.description: Used in featured collections and custom collection sidebar area

collection.name: Short Description
collection.description: A short description of the collection to appear under the heading

product.name: Search product boosts
product.description: List of search queries for which a product gets higher rank in search results

product.name: Related products
product.description: List of related products

product.name: Related products settings
product.description: Determines how related products are displayed along with algorithmic product recommendations

product.name: Complementary products
product.description: List of complementary products

product.name: Brand
product.description: The brand (vendors provide multiple brands)

product.name: Product videos
product.description: Youtube iframe embeds

product.name: Product specifications
product.description: Technical product info. Use HTML Generator Page to create clean markup. Use H3 for subheadings.

product.name: Product warranty
product.description: Warranty Information

product.name: Product short description
product.description: The short product intro above the accordion

product.name: Product assembly information
product.description: Assembly info like PDFs, lists etc

product.name: Google: Custom Product
product.description: Use to indicate whether or not the unique product identifiers (UPIs) GTIN, MPN, and brand are available for your product.

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Upholstery material
product.description: Identifies the fabric used for upholstery, such as leather or velvet

product.name: Tabletop color
product.description: Specifies the color of a table's top surface, such as black or white

product.name: Frame color
product.description: Specifies the color of a product's frame, such as clear or gold

product.name: FAQs
product.description: List of product FAQ metaobjects

product.name: Furniture/Fixture material
product.description: Identifies the main material used in furniture or fixtures, like wood or metal

product.name: Furniture/Fixture features
product.description: Highlights special characteristics of furniture or fixtures, like adjustable shelves or built-in mirror

product.name: Leg material
product.description: Specifies the material used for the legs of a product, such as cherry wood or bamboo

product.name: Product video items
product.description: Product video items contain a heading, text, and URL to the hosted video e.g. YouTube

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 1
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 02
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 4
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Size System
variant.description: The country of the size system used by your product.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 3
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Age Group
variant.description: The demographic for which your product is intended.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 0
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Condition
variant.description: The condition of your product at time of sale.

variant.name: Google: Gender
variant.description: The gender for which your product is intended.
